channel.title: researchblogging.org on I'm a Chordata! Urochordata!
channel.description: Recent content in researchblogging.org on I'm a Chordata! Urochordata!

item.title: I'm an Editor?
item.description: So, someone over at researchblogging.org was decidedly foolish, and asked me to be one of their new editors-at-large for Biology. That means, every Thursday, I’ll be posting the three biology (typically ecology and evolution) research paper reviews linked through researchblogging.org that I enjoyed the most. My first post is up, and hopefully there will be many more to come!
